traffic_violation.trigger: If the player uses a fuel symbol card when moving a non-exiled survivor:

unsanitary_conditions.intro: You can feel the heat coming from your throbbing wound. The slightest press of your index finger produces a foul colored pus and a pain that can't be ignored. You suppose infection was inevitable - there are no showers, no running water, and the soap ran out a week ago. And you're not the only one like this. Antibiotics are a precious resource now, so everyone's hoping to shake off infections naturally. But a glance at your wound tells you all you need to know. If you don't get treated soon you could die.
unsanitary_conditions.name: Unsanitary Conditions

options.label: Only Option
options.result: If you still control any survivors with wound tokens on them, place 1 additional wound token on those survivors.
options.subtext: You may place 1 medicine card into the waste pile to remove all wounds from a survivor you control. You may do this multiple times.

unsanitary_conditions.trigger: If the player controls 1 or more wounded survivors and there are 5 or more cards in the waste pile:

wants_of_the_flesh.intro: You've never liked Mickey. He's a creep, and you wish you hadn't been left alone with him. But when you spot him sneaking off to the basement, you decide to follow. You hear growling in the darkness. What's going on down here? You find them behind a boiler, and clap a hand over your mouth. The dead woman has been tied to an old bed frame. She gnashes her teeth and struggles against her restraints as Mickey unzips his pants and crawls on top of her.
wants_of_the_flesh.name: Wants Of The Flesh

options.label: Sneak
options.result: You sneak up behind Mickey and give the monster what he deserves pushing his face down into the jaws of the dead woman. Remove the helpless survivor and place a despair token on the survivor at the colony.

options.label: Warn
options.result: You go to the others, and tell them what you've seen. Mickey curses you as you expel him naked from the colony. Remove the helpless survivor and place a bandit and a zombie together at a random location.

wants_of_the_flesh.trigger: If the player has the only survivor at the colony, and there is only 1 helpless survivor:

war.intro: "This town can't support two communities and those bastards are picking the place clean. If we truly mean to make a home here, and God knows we've done everything we can, then it's time to fight. We can't keep battling the dead as well as the living." Every non-exiled player votes with a thumbs up or down.
war.name: War

options.label: War
options.result: Roll a die for each non-helpless survivor and set successes aside. A survivor with a gun equipped needs to roll 2+ to be a success. A survivor without a gun equipped needs to roll 5+ to be a success. Roll a die for each bandit. Set aside successes in a separate pile. Bandits need to roll 4+ to be a success. If the total number of survivor successes exceeds the total number of bandit successes, all bandits are killed. If the bandits have more successes all survivors receive 1 wound. If it's a tie, nothing happens.

options.label: Peace
options.result: Nothing happens.

war.trigger: If there are 6 or more bandits in play:

welcome_home.intro: Oh God. This is the street your parents lived on. How changed is the world that you didn't recognize it? And now you can't stop yourself - you have to know. You turn from your intended destination, and soon open the back door to their house. The smell that assaults you warns of what awaits, but you still enter. You find your mother in the living room, face down on the floor. Her head is a halo of dried gore and your father's Colt lies next to her. You don't even have a chance to mourn before the thing that was your father comes crawling down the stairs.
welcome_home.name: Welcome Home

options.label: Mercy
options.result: You dive for the gun and take aim. You struggle to pull the trigger, but soon he's right on top of you, his hands scrabbling at your feet. "I'm sorry Poppa." Roll once for exposure on the moved survivor. If the survivor isn't killed attach this card to it. Once per round when this survivor performs an attack do not roll for exposure.
options.subtext: Reach for the gun and shoot.

options.label: Run
options.result: You run out of the house and don't look back. There was no way you could have shot him. Nothing happens.

welcome_home.trigger: If the player moves a survivor:

wounded_survivor.intro: "Oh thank God you're alive," the stranger says. "I was afraid you were one of the dead ones. God, I'm in bad shape. I was with some others I met a few weeks ago, but our group was gradually split up or killed. It'd sure be great to team up with somebody again. You got a group?" Your gaze wanders from the stranger's eyes to the blood-soaked rags wrapped around their right hand. "Oh this? This is nothing man. Just cut it up on some broken glass when I was looting a store back there." The stranger laughs it off as nothing, but they seem nervous about something.
wounded_survivor.name: Wounded Survivor

options.label: Recruit
options.result: Draw a card from the survivor deck and add it to your following. After the new survivor is placed in the colony, roll for exposure twice on that survivor.
options.subtext: You tell the stranger about the colony.

options.label: Alone
options.result: "I'm sorry friend, but I prefer to go it alone. Nothing personal." Nothing happens.
options.subtext: Do not tell the stranger about the colony.

wounded_survivor.trigger: If the player performs a search with a non-exiled survivor:
